title: Heart Attack Symptoms
content: Chest pain with sweating, nausea, left arm or jaw pain can indicate myocardial infarction and requires emergency treatment.

title: Appendicitis
content: Right lower abdominal pain with fever, nausea, and rebound tenderness suggests appendicitis.

title: Pneumonia
content: Fever, cough, shortness of breath, and chest discomfort may indicate pneumonia.

title: Meningitis
content: Severe headache, fever, and stiff neck are classic signs of meningitis and require urgent care.
